pkgmetadata.longdescription: aiml implements an interpreter for AIML, the Artificial IntelligenceMarkup Language developed by Dr. Richard Wallace of the A.L.I.C.E. Foundation.It can be used to implement a conversational AI program.Forked from:* 0.9.1 https://github.com/paulovn/python-aiml* 0.8.6 https://github.com/cdwfs/pyaimlPyAIML (c) Cort Stratton
